meanings: (하고 싶다) (동사로 쓰여) want (to), would like to, wish (to), (formal) desire (to), feel like (doing)
(~한 생각이 들다) (동사로 쓰여) look, seem, appear

meanings.meaning: I, etc. could have bitten my/his/her tongue out/off

vlive.korean: 뭔가 이제 뭐 꼭 이 얘기는 해주고 싶었다 그런 얘기는 없습니까, 또 우리 뷔 씨? Is there any story behind you wanted to share? 듣기 View video BTS : R&V !!!!!!!!!!🤩🤩
vlive.english: Is there any story behind you wanted to share?

vlive.korean: '보고 싶었다!' 보고 싶었어요! "I missed you!" I missed you, too! 듣기 View video VICTON : 찬이의 조금 늦은 생일🎉🎉
vlive.english: "I missed you!" I missed you, too!

vlive.korean: 너무 오래 보고 싶었다 너무 우리... 너무 못 봤죠? I missed you. It's been awhile, right? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 새해부터 에이티니에게 받은 고마운 선물❤️
vlive.english: I missed you. It's been awhile, right?

vlive.korean: [우주 180325개 모아도 모자랄 만큼 보고싶었다 스키즈] 진짜... 너무나 보고 싶었죠 그쵸? [I can't begin to describe how much I missed you] We really... missed them, right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [Stray Kids] (똑똑) 택배왔습니다📦 잘생긴 사람 택배왔습니다❤️🖤 (Stray kids talking about the hair)
vlive.english: [I can't begin to describe how much I missed you] We really... missed them, right?

vlive.korean: 이런 무대를 보여주고 싶었다 이런 게 있나요? was there anything you want to show to fans? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#120. 컴백 두둠칯 (w. CLC)
vlive.english: was there anything you want to show to fans?

examples.korean: I was tempted to snap back angrily at him. 발음듣기 나는 그에게 화를 내며 되쏘아 주고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I was tempted to snap back angrily at him. 발음

examples.korean: She wanted to travel to broaden her horizons. 발음듣기 그녀는 시야를 넓히기 위해 여행을 하고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She wanted to travel to broaden her horizons. 발음

examples.korean: She wanted to avoid another confrontation with her father. 발음듣기 그녀는 아버지와 또 다시 대립하는 것은 피하고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She wanted to avoid another confrontation with her father. 발음

examples.korean: He ached to see her. 발음듣기 그는 그녀가 못 견디게 보고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He ached to see her. 발음

examples.korean: He wanted to experiment more with different textures in his paintings. 발음듣기 그는 다른 질감들로 자기 그림을 더 많이 실험해 보고 싶었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He wanted to experiment more with different textures in his paintings. 발음
